data.scheme_name: Development of Commercial Horticulture through Production and Post Harvest Management of Horticulture Crops  - Commercial Horticulture Development in protected cover on project mode  - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme offers Credit linked back-ended subsidy at 50% of the entire project cost, up to a maximum of Rs 56 lakh per project.
data.eligibility:
Organizations/promoters, such as: Association of Growers, Individuals, Group of farmer growers/consumers, Farmers Producer Organizations (FPOs), Partnership/Proprietary Firms, Self Help groups (SHGs), NGOs, Companies, Corporations, Cooperatives, Co-operative Marketing Federations, Agricultural Produce Marketing Committees, Marketing Boards/Committees, Municipal Corporations/ Committees, Agro Industries Corporations, SAUs and other concerned R and D organizations are eligible to get assistance under all the NHB schemes.

Eligible Crops:
1. Flowers: Anthurium, Orchids, Rose, Lilium, Chrysanthemum, Carnation and Gerbera.
2. Vegetables: High value vegetables: Capsicum, Cucumber, Tomato
data.conditions:
Maximum Project Cost allowed:
  1. Green House Structure  :
    • Fan and Pad system - Rs. 1400/Sqm and Rs. 1610/Sqm for hilly states-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 sqm.
    • Naturally ventilated system
      • Tubular structure - Rs 844/Sqm and Rs 970/Sqm for hilly states-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above2500 Sqm
      • Wooden structure - Rs. 540/Sqm and Rs. 621/Sqm for hilly states -Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm
      • Bamboo structure - Rs. 450/Sqm and Rs. 518/Sqm for hilly states-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm
  2. Shade Net House  :
    • Tubular Structure - Rs. 710/Sqm and Rs. 816/Sqm for hilly states-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm
    • Wooden Structure - Rs. 492/Sqm and Rs. 566/Sqm for hilly states-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm
    • Bamboo Structure - Rs.360/Sqm and Rs 414/Sqm for hilly states-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm
  3. Plastic Tunnel - Rs.60/Sqm and Rs.75/sqm for hilly states-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm
  4. Walk in Tunnel - Rs.600/ Sqm-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm
  5. Anti-Bird/Anti Hail Nets - Rs.35/Sqm-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm
  6. Cost of Planting Material and cultivation of High Value vegetables grown in Poly House/Shade net House - Rs.140/Sqm-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm.
  7. Cost of Planting Material and cultivation of Orchid and Anthurium grown in Poly House/Shade net House - Rs.700/Sqm-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm
  8. Cost of Planting Material and cultivation of Carnation & Gerbera grown in Poly House/Shade net House - Rs.610/Sqm-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm
  9.  Cost of Planting Material and cultivation of Rose &Lilium grown in Poly House/Shade net House - Rs.426/Sqm-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm
  10. Plastic Mulching - Rs.32000/Ha and Rs.36800/Ha for Hilly Areas-Assistance will be 50% of cost for above 2500 Sqm

data.context: The scheme was introduced to develop and boost agriculture industry
data.objective: Projects relating to the setting up of new units shall be technically and financially appraised to ensure and enable the entrepreneur to incorporate the latest available technology.
data.description: Credit linked back-ended subsidy at 50% of the total project cost limited to Rs 56 lakh per project as per admissible cost norms for green houses, shade net house, plastic tunnel, anti bird/hail nets & cost of planting material etc.
data.how_to_apply:
Online application can be made through - http://nhb.gov.in/OnlineApplication/RegistrationForm.aspx
Apply through banks and other eligible financial institutions.
data.funding_facilitator: Banks and other eligible financial institutions.
data.funding_mechanism: The eligible units will get the benefit after the approval by National Horticulture Board for claim submitted
data.additional_info: Assistance can also be availed for a combination of PHM infrastructure components by a beneficiary, within the prescribed norms of individual items.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Application form 
2. Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) 
3. Cost of application form 
4. Scheme brochure 
5. Certified documents of the piece of project land 
6. Detailed project report (DPR) 
7. Detailed appraisal notes by NHB 
8. Declaration form (In a prescribed format in case of Cold storage project) 
9. Basic Datasheet (In prescribed format in case of Cold storage project) 
10. Statement of Expenditure (Certified by Chartered Accountant) 
11. Financial appraisal report from the bank authorities 
12. Term Loan sanctioned letter. 
13. Term loan disbursement statement of the project 
14. Bank loan account 
15. Other KYC Documents
data.checklist_info_d:
